argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | resvbas.1 | |- H = ( G |`v A ) |
| 2 |  | #P_eqidd | |- ( A e. V -> ( Base ` G ) = ( Base ` G ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` G ) = ( Base ` G ) |
| 4 | 1, 3 | #P_resvbas | |- ( A e. V -> ( Base ` G ) = ( Base ` H ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( +g ` G ) = ( +g ` G ) |
| 6 | 1, 5 | #P_resvplusg | |- ( A e. V -> ( +g ` G ) = ( +g ` H ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_oveqdr | |- ( ( A e. V /\ ( x e. ( Base ` G ) /\ y e. ( Base ` G ) ) ) -> ( x ( +g ` G ) y ) = ( x ( +g ` H ) y ) ) |
| 8 | 2, 4, 7 | #P_cmnpropd | |- ( A e. V -> ( G e. CMnd <-> H e. CMnd ) ) |
